name: Tick
description: A single tick. Exchange, asset pair and time range are discerned from the context of its acquisition.

start.description: Price of the first trade_history item on the set folded set.

high.description: Highest price in the folded set.

low.description: Lowest price in the folded set.

last.description: Last price in the folded set.

count.description: The amount of items that were folded.
